Sentencas: In order to be a real competitor to other industrial-scale hydrogen production technologies, solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOEC) must present essential features such as high hydrogen production rates, load flexibility and high system efficiency.
Titulo: Development of test protocols for solid oxide electrolysis cells operated under accelerated degradation conditions

Sentencas: However, operating conditions necessary to achieve these objectives can induce undesired performance deterioration and microstructural degradation negatively influencing the long-term stability of SOECs.
Titulo: Development of test protocols for solid oxide electrolysis cells operated under accelerated degradation conditions

Sentencas: This work provides the results of experimental investigations on the performance of SOECs operated under different operating conditions.
Titulo: Development of test protocols for solid oxide electrolysis cells operated under accelerated degradation conditions

Sentencas: In order to induce and accelerate specific degradation phenomena high steam partial pressures, fast load changes, high voltages, high steam conversion rates and alternating mode were applied.
Titulo: Development of test protocols for solid oxide electrolysis cells operated under accelerated degradation conditions

Sentencas: Different kinds and degrees of impact on performance and microstructure were observed and analyzed in detail.
Titulo: Development of test protocols for solid oxide electrolysis cells operated under accelerated degradation conditions

Sentencas: Correlations between performance changes and their underlying processes were investigated and useful connections between them were discovered.
Titulo: Development of test protocols for solid oxide electrolysis cells operated under accelerated degradation conditions

Sentencas: The major findings are summarized in the form of a suggestion for accelerated stress test (AST) protocols for SOECs.
Titulo: Development of test protocols for solid oxide electrolysis cells operated under accelerated degradation conditions

Sentencas: The developed ASTs enable deeper understanding of several degradation phenomena induced by different operating conditions and present methods for identification thereof.
Titulo: Development of test protocols for solid oxide electrolysis cells operated under accelerated degradation conditions

Sentencas: Further, the ASTs were estimated to have potential to predict performance changes over long-term operating periods.
Titulo: Development of test protocols for solid oxide electrolysis cells operated under accelerated degradation conditions
